<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"- Execute a claim (one-time minting of tokens on Shannon) of total tokens owned by a Morse account\n- Mint claimed tokens to the given Shannon account\n- Stake that Shannon account as an application for the given service_config and same stake amount\n\nNext free index: 7","type":"object","title":"MsgClaimMorseApplication is used to:","properties":{"morse_public_key":{"description":"The ed25519 public key of the morse account with morse_src_address.","type":"string","format":"byte"},"morse_signature":{"type":"string","format":"byte","title":"The hex-encoded signature, by the Morse account, of this message (where this field is nil).\nI.e.: morse_signature = private_key.sign(marshal(MsgClaimMorseAccount{morse_signature: nil, ...}))"},"service_config":{"description":"The services this application is staked to request service for.\nNOTE: This is not a repeated field, as in MsgStakeApplication,\nbecause an application can only be staked for one service.","type":"object","title":"ApplicationServiceConfig holds the service configuration the application stakes for","properties":{"service_id":{"type":"string","title":"The Service ID for which the application is configured"}}},"shannon_dest_address":{"description":"The bech32-encoded address of the Shannon account to which the claimed tokens\nwill be minted and from which the application will be staked.","type":"string"},"shannon_signing_address":{"description":"The bech32-encoded address of the Shannon account which is signing for this message.\nThis account is liable for any fees incurred by violating the constraints of Morse\naccount/actor claim message fee waiving; the tx contains ONE OR MORE Morse account/actor\nclaim messages AND has EXACTLY ONE signer.","type":"string"}}}}},"description":"- Execute a claim (one-time minting of tokens on Shannon) of total tokens owned by a Morse account\n- Mint claimed tokens to the given Shannon account\n- Stake that Shannon account as an application for the given service_config and same stake amount\n\nNext free index: 7","required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
